summary.span: 代表對話方塊表單，其中包含 ，以便從 Windows Form 應用程式列印。

span.span: Represents a dialog box form that contains a for printing from a Windows Forms application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立的執行個體類別，部分讀取/寫入屬性會設定為初始值。When you create an instance of the class, some of the read/write properties are set to initial values. 如需這些值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of these values, see the constructor. 如需有關使用 Windows Form 列印的詳細資訊，請參閱命名空間概觀。For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the namespace overview. 如果您想要從 Windows Presentation Foundation 應用程式列印，請參閱命名空間。If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範設定和屬性。The following code example demonstrates the setting the and properties. 此範例假設此表單包含名為`TreeView1`包含物件。The example assumes the form contains a named `TreeView1` that contains objects. 每個屬性物件必須設定為執行此範例的電腦可以存取完整的文件名稱。The property of each object must be set to a fully qualified document name that can be accessed by the machine running the example. 設定每個屬性設為字串，識別所指定的檔案屬性。Set each property to a string that identifies the file specified by the property. 比方說，您可以設定`TreeNode1.Tag`來 「 c:\myDocuments\recipe.doc"和`TreeNode1.Text`來 「 recipe.doc"。For example, you could set `TreeNode1.Tag` to "c:\myDocuments\recipe.doc" and `TreeNode1.Text` to "recipe.doc". 此範例也假設此表單包含名為`PrintPreviewDialog1`和名為按鈕`Button1`。The example also assumes the form contains a named `PrintPreviewDialog1` and a button named `Button1`. 若要執行此範例中，呼叫`InitializePrintPreviewDialog`表單的建構函式中的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example, call the `InitializePrintPreviewDialog` method in the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立的執行個體，則屬性會初始化為`null`。When you create an instance of , the property is initialized to `null`. 您可以在執行階段變更此屬性的值。You can change the value for this property at run time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範設定和屬性。The following code example demonstrates the setting the and properties. 此範例假設此表單包含名為`TreeView1`包含物件。The example assumes the form contains a named `TreeView1` that contains objects. 每個屬性物件必須設定為執行此範例的電腦可以存取完整的文件名稱。The property of each object must be set to a fully qualified document name that can be accessed by the machine running the example. 設定每個屬性設為字串，識別所指定的檔案屬性。Set each property to a string that identifies the file specified by the property. 比方說，您可以設定`TreeNode1.Tag`來 「 c:\myDocuments\recipe.doc"和`TreeNode1.Text`來 「 recipe.doc"。For example, you could set `TreeNode1.Tag` to "c:\myDocuments\recipe.doc" and `TreeNode1.Text` to "recipe.doc". 此範例也假設此表單包含名為`PrintPreviewDialog1`和名為按鈕`Button1`。The example also assumes the form contains a named `PrintPreviewDialog1` and a button named `Button1`. 若要執行此範例中，呼叫`InitializePrintPreviewDialog`表單的建構函式中的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example, call the `InitializePrintPreviewDialog` method in the form's constructor or event handler. summary.span: 取得或設定使用者按下 ENTER 鍵時所按下的表單上按鈕。

span.span: Gets or sets the button on the form that is clicked when the user presses the ENTER key.

value.span: ，代表做為表單接受按鈕的按鈕。

span.span: An that represents the button to use as the accept button for the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性與這個類別無關。This property is not relevant for this class. 這個屬性可讓您指定發生於使用者按下 ENTER 鍵，在您的應用程式中的預設動作。This property allows you to designate a default action that occurs when the user presses the ENTER key in your application. 必須是指派給這個屬性的按鈕，位於目前的表單上，或位於目前的表單上的容器。The button assigned to this property must be an that is on the current form or located within a container on the current form. 您可以讓使用者快速，讓它們能夠在完成而不是手動按一下 [接受] 按鈕，使用其滑鼠時，按 ENTER 鍵巡覽，簡單的表單，比方說，使用這個屬性。You can use this property, for example, to allow the user to quickly navigate a simple form by allowing them to press the ENTER key when they are finished instead of manually clicking the accept button with their mouse. 如果目前選取的控制項在表單上攔截 ENTER 鍵，並加以處理，可能無法啟動 [接受] 按鈕。The accept button might not be activated if the currently selected control on the form intercepts the ENTER key and processes it. 例如，多行文字方塊控制項允許選取要在控制項中插入新行字元時被按下 ENTER 鍵。For example, a multiline text box control allows the ENTER key to be pressed when it is selected to insert a new line character in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性，以允許您的表單，並自動調整其控制項根據字型中的變更。You can use this property to allow your form and its controls to automatically adjust based on changes in the font. 這可用於應用程式字型位置可能會增加或減少以指定用於 Windows 的語言。This can be useful in applications where the font might increase or decrease based on the language specified for use by Windows. 若要取得就會自動在表單的大小調整規模，請以使用屬性。To obtain the size the form will auto scale to, use the property. 如果您想要決定大小的表單會自動擴充，以根據特定的字型，使用方法。If you want to determine the size the form will auto scale to based on a specific font, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性與這個類別無關。This property is not relevant for this class. 表單的框線樣式會決定表單的外部邊緣的顯示方式。The border style of the form determines how the outer edge of the form appears. 除了變更表單的框線顯示特定框線樣式可以防止表單在調整過大小。In addition to changing the border display for a form, certain border styles prevent the form from being sized. 比方說，框線樣式的對話方塊中變更表單的框線，並防止表單正在調整大小。For example, the border style changes the border of the form to that of a dialog box and prevents the form from being resized. 大小或表單的標題列區段的可用性，也可能影響的框線樣式。The border style can also affect the size or availability of the caption bar section of a form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性與這個類別無關。This property is not relevant for this class. 當這個屬性設定為`true`，表單將接收所有， ，和事件。When this property is set to `true`, the form will receive all , , and events. 表單的事件處理常式已處理按鍵輸入完成後，並接著會將按鍵輸入指派給具有焦點的控制項。After the form's event handlers have completed processing the keystroke, the keystroke is then assigned to the control with focus. 您可以使用這個屬性來處理所有的按鍵輸入，在您的應用程式並不是處理按鍵輸入，或呼叫適當的控制項來處理按鍵輸入。You can use this property to process all keystrokes in your application and either handle the keystroke or call the appropriate control to handle the keystroke. 比方說，當應用程式使用功能鍵，您可能想要處理表單層次，而非撰寫程式碼可能會收到按鍵輸入事件的每個控制項的按鍵輸入。For example, when an application uses function keys, you might want to process the keystrokes at the form level rather than writing code for each control that might receive keystroke events. > [!NOTE] > 如果表單中不的任何可見的或已啟用的控制項，它會自動收到所有的鍵盤事件。If a form has no visible or enabled controls, it automatically receives all keyboard events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性與這個類別無關。This property is not relevant for this class. 如果表單是另一種形式的子系，在 Windows 工作列中將不會顯示子表單。If a form is a child of another form, the child form is not displayed in the Windows taskbar. 您可以使用這個屬性，以防止使用者選取您的表單，透過 Windows 工作列。You can use this property to prevent users from selecting your form through the Windows taskbar. 例如，如果您顯示**尋找和取代**在您的應用程式的工具視窗，您可以防止該視窗因為您會需要應用程式的主視窗和透過Windows工作列中，選取**尋找和取代**以便適當地處理搜尋所顯示的工具視窗。For example, if you display a **Find and Replace** tool window in your application, you might want to prevent that window from being selected through the Windows taskbar, since you would need both the application's main window and the **Find and Replace** tool window displayed in order to process searches appropriately.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性與這個類別無關。This property is not relevant for this class. 當屬性會被指派，具有相同的表單區域將以透明方式顯示。When the property is assigned a , the areas of the form that have the same will be displayed transparently. 透明區域下方的 windows 會傳輸任何滑鼠動作，例如按一下滑鼠，表單透明區域上執行。Any mouse actions, such as the click of the mouse, that are performed on the transparent areas of the form will be transferred to the windows below the transparent area. 比方說，如果表單的工作區是透明，按一下將滑鼠停在該區域會傳送事件通知的按一下其下方的任何視窗。For example, if the client region of a form is made transparent, clicking the mouse on that area will send the event notification of the click to any window that is below it. 如果色彩指派給屬性等同於表單上的任何控制項，則也會顯示以透明的方式。If the color assigned to the property is the same as any controls on the form, they also will be displayed transparently. 比方說，如果您有已在表單上的控制項及其屬性設定為，除非控制項也會以透明方式顯示屬性控制項變更為不同的色彩。For example, if you have a control on a form that has its property set to , the control will be displayed transparently unless the property of the control is changed to a different color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字型呈現時的消除鋸齒移除不規則線條。Anti-aliasing removes jagged lines when fonts are rendered. 下列程式碼範例示範設定和屬性。The following code example demonstrates the setting the and properties. 此範例假設此表單包含名為`TreeView1`包含物件。The example assumes the form contains a named `TreeView1` that contains objects. 每個屬性物件必須設定為執行此範例的電腦可以存取完整的文件名稱。The property of each object must be set to a fully qualified document name that can be accessed by the machine running the example. 設定每個屬性設為字串，識別所指定的檔案屬性。Set each property to a string that identifies the file specified by the property. 比方說，您可以設定`TreeNode1.Tag`來 「 c:\myDocuments\recipe.doc"和`TreeNode1.Text`來 「 recipe.doc"。For example, you could set `TreeNode1.Tag` to "c:\myDocuments\recipe.doc" and `TreeNode1.Text` to "recipe.doc". 此範例也假設此表單包含名為`PrintPreviewDialog1`和名為按鈕`Button1`。The example also assumes the form contains a named `PrintPreviewDialog1` and a button named `Button1`. 若要執行此範例中，呼叫`InitializePrintPreviewDialog`表單的建構函式中的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example, call the `InitializePrintPreviewDialog` method in the form's constructor or event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 顯示表單之前，請屬性永遠設為，而不論其初始設定值。Before a form is displayed, the property is always set to , regardless of its initial setting. 這會反映在， ， ，和屬性設定。This is reflected in the , , , and property settings. 如果它顯示之後，會隱藏表單，這些屬性會反映先前的狀態在表單顯示一次，不論所做的變更直到屬性。If a form is hidden after it has been shown, these properties reflect the previous state until the form is shown again, regardless of any changes made to the property.
